{{obj.name}}
{{obj.type}}
{{obj.category}}
{{concate(obj.ingredients)}}
{{obj.max_number_per_day}}
{{obj.price}}
{{obj.description}}
{{obj.link}}
import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import { ViewChild } from '@angular/core'; import { ElementRef } from '@angular/core'; // import dishes_data from 'dishes_data.json'; @Component({ selector: 'app-menu', templateUrl: './menu.component.html', styleUrls: ['./menu.component.css'] }) export class MenuComponent{ @ViewChild('books') books: ElementRef; // ngAfterViewInit(){ // this.div.nativeElement.setAttribute('highlight', ''); // } object = new Dish("Kotlet", "Danie obiadowe", "Danie mięsne", ["mięso schabowe", "ziemniaki"], 12, 13.20, "Pyszny domowy kotlecik!", "link"); objects:Dish[] = [this.object]; create(object:Dish){ let name = object.name; let type = object.type; let category = object.category; let ingredients = object.ingredients; let max_number_per_day = object.max_number_per_day; let price = object.price; let description = object.description; let link = object.link; const el = document.createElement("div"); el.classList.add("book") el.style.setProperty("background-color", "#B0B0B0"); let bin = document.createElement("button"); bin.classList.add("material-symbols-outlined") bin.classList.add("bin") bin.innerText = "delete"; // bin.addEventListener('click', delete_div, false) // bins_btn.push(bin) const name_text = document.createElement("div"); name_text.innerText = name name_text.classList.add("data1") const type_text = document.createElement("div"); type_text.innerText = type type_text.classList.add("data1") const category_text = document.createElement("div"); category_text.innerText = type category_text.classList.add("data1") const ingredients_text = document.createElement("div"); let str = ""; for(let i = 0; i < ingredients.length; i++){ str = str + ingredients[i]; } ingredients_text.innerText = str ingredients_text.classList.add("data1") const max_number_text = document.createElement("div"); max_number_text.innerText = max_number_per_day.toString(); max_number_text.classList.add("data1") const price_text = document.createElement("div"); price_text.innerText = price.toString(); price_text.classList.add("data1") const description_text = document.createElement("div"); description_text.innerText = description; description_text.classList.add("data1") const link_text = document.createElement("div"); link_text.innerText = link; link_text.classList.add("data1") // let books_ = document.getElementsByClassName('books'); // const books = document.getElementById('books'); // const arr = Array.from(books_); // let books = arr[0]; // if(books != null){ // @ViewChild('books') div: ElementRef; el.appendChild(name_text) el.appendChild(type_text) el.appendChild(category_text) el.appendChild(ingredients_text) el.appendChild(max_number_text) el.appendChild(price_text) el.appendChild(description_text) el.appendChild(link_text) el.appendChild(bin) this.books.nativeElement.appendChild(el); return el; //} } concate(a:string[]){ let str = ""; for(let i = 0; i < a.length; i++){ if(str.length != 0){ str = str + ", " } str = str + a[i]; } return str; } } class Dish { name: string; type: string; category: string; ingredients: string[]; max_number_per_day: number; price: number; description: string; link: string; constructor(name: string, type: string, category: string, ingredients: string[], max_number_per_day: number, price: number, description: string, link: string){ this.name = name; this.type = type; this.category = category; this.ingredients = ingredients; this.max_number_per_day = max_number_per_day this.price = price; this.description = description; this.link = link; } } //} // const btn = document.querySelector('.add');
